Scenario
==========
FILE: src/fx/scenario/Scenario.java
URL: file:///C://T5/TFX/src/fx/scenario/Scenario.png

Who   List of presences
What  List of objects
Why   List of reasons
Where Description of area
When  Time & duration
With  Outside references (Powers&Players)

defines parts of a scenario
